<Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#e5f0ee" hideEditor="true" value="#e5f0ee"/> <Variable name="startSide" description="Start side in blog language" type="automatic" default="left" hideEditor="true" /> <Variable name="endSide" description="End side in blog language" type="automatic" default="right" hideEditor="true" />
<!-- Variable definitions -->
<Group description="Body"> <Variable name="body.background" description="Background" color="$(body.background.color)" type="background" default="$(color) none repeat scroll top left" value="$(color) none repeat scroll top left"/> <Variable name="body.background.color" description="Body background color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="body.text.font" description="Font" type="font" default="$(loraNormal20)" value="400 20px Lora, serif"/> <Variable name="body.text.color" description="Color" type="color" default="#292929" value="#292929"/> <Variable name="body.link.color" description="Link color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#3367D6"/> <Variable name="body.link.visited.color" description="Visited link color" type="color" default="$(body.link.color)" value="#3367D6"/> <Variable name="body.link.hover.color" description="Link Hover Color" type="color" default="$(body.link.color)" value="#3367D6"/> <Variable name="blog.title.font" description="Blog Title Font" type="font" default="$(openSansBold24)" value="700 24px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="blog.title.color" description="Blog Title Color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> </Group>
<Group description="Featured post" selector=".heroPost"> <Variable name="heropost.main.background.color" description="Featured post main background color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="heropost.main.title.color" description="Featured post main title color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="heropost.main.text.color" description="Featured post main text color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="heropost.main.button.color" description="Featured post main buttons color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="heropost.main.link.color" description="Featured post main link color" type="color" default="#173752" value="#173752"/> <Variable name="heropost.secondary.background.color" description="Featured post background color (secondary)" type="color" default="#e5f0ee" value="#e5f0ee"/> <Variable name="heropost.secondary.text.color" description="Featured post text color (secondary)" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="heropost.secondary.button.color" description="Featured post buttons color (secondary)" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="heropost.secondary.dropcap.color" description="Featured post drop cap color (secondary)" type="color" default="$(heropost.secondary.button.color)" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header" selector=".centered-top-container"> <Variable name="header.background" description="Header Background" color="$(header.background.color)" type="background" default="$(color) none repeat scroll top left" value="$(color) none repeat scroll top left"/> <Variable name="header.background.color" description="Background color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="header.description.font" description="Description font" type="font" default="$(openSansNormal14)" value="400 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="header.description.color" description="Description Color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)"/> <Variable name="header.pages.color" description="Page list color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="header.pages.selected.color" description="Page list color (selected page)" type="color" default="$(header.pages.color)" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="header.items.color" description="Text color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="header.items.font" description="Text font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> </Group>
<Group description="Search"> <Variable name="search.input.font" description="Input font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold16)" value="600 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> </Group>
<Group description="Feed" selector=".widget.Blog"> <Variable name="feed.title.font" description="Post title font" type="font" default="$(openSansBold36)" value="700 36px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="feed.title.color" description="Post title color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="feed.subtitle.font" description="Post subtitle font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold16)" value="600 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="feed.subtitle.color" description="Post subtitle color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)"/> <Variable name="feed.text.font" description="Post text font" type="font" default="$(loraNormal20)" value="400 20px Lora, serif"/> <Variable name="feed.text.color" description="Post text color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)"/> <Variable name="feed.button.font" description="Button font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="feed.button.color" description="Button color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Group description="Sharing" selector=".sharing"> <Variable name="sharing.background.color" description="Sharing background color" type="color" default="$(body.background.color)" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="sharing.text.color" description="Sharing text color" type="color" default="$(feed.button.color)" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="sharing.icons.color" description="Sharing icons color" type="color" default="$(sharing.text.color)" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Group description="Dialogs" selector=".subscribe-popup"> <Variable name="dialog.title.font" description="Dialog title font" type="font" default="$(openSansBold24)" value="700 24px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="dialog.title.color" description="Dialog title color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)"/> <Variable name="dialog.input.font" description="Dialog input font" type="font" default="$(openSansNormal14)" value="400 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="dialog.input.color" description="Dialog input color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)"/> <Variable name="dialog.action.font" description="Dialog action font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="dialog.action.color" description="Dialog action color" type="color" default="$(feed.button.color)" value="#25a186"/> </Group>
<Group description="Individual Post or Page" selector="body.item-page .widget.Blog"> <Variable name="item.title.font" description="Font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold48)" value="600 48px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.title.color" description="Post title color" type="color" default="#fff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="item.title.background.color" description="Post title background color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="item.subtitle.font" description="Post subtitle font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold16)" value="600 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.subtitle.color" description="Post subtitle color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)"/> <Variable name="item.byline.color" description="Post byline color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="item.byline.font" description="Post byline font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.action.color" description="Action color" type="color" default="#25a186" value="#25a186"/> <Variable name="item.action.font" description="Action font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.label.font" description="Label font" type="font" default="$(openSansNormal14)" value="400 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="item.blockquote.font" description="Blockquote font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemiboldItalic44)" value="italic 600 44px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> </Group>
<Group description="Sidebar" selector=".sidebar-container"> <Variable name="sidebar.backgroundColor" description="Background color" type="color" default="$(body.background.color)" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="sidebar.icon.color" description="Icon color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.separator.color" description="Separator color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.widget.title.font" description="Gadget title font" type="font" default="$(openSansNormal16)" value="400 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="sidebar.widget.title.color" description="Gadget title color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.profile.title.color" description="Profile name color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.profile.text.color" description="Profile description color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="sidebar.profile.link.font" description="Profile link font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold16)" value="600 16px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="sidebar.profile.link.color" description="Profile link color" type="color" default="$(body.link.color)" value="#3367D6"/> </Group>
<Variable name="attribution.text.font" description="Attribution text font" type="font" default="$(openSansSemibold14)" hideEditor="true" value="600 14px Open Sans, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="attribution.icon.color" description="Attribution icon color" type="color" default="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)" hideEditor="true" value="rgba(0,0,0,0.54)"/>
<Group description="Widths"> <Variable name="sidebar.width" description="Sidebar width" type="length" min="100px" max="1000px" default="320px" value="320px"/> <Variable name="feed.width" description="Content width" type="length" min="860px" max="1440px" default="1280px" value="1280px"/> </Group> */
body{ overflow-wrap:break-word; word-break:break-word; word-wrap:break-word } .hidden{ display:none } .invisible{ visibility:hidden } .container::after,.float-container::after{ clear:both; content:""; display:table } .clearboth{ clear:both } #comments .comment .comment-actions,.subscribe-popup .FollowByEmail .follow-by-email-submit,.widget.Profile .profile-link{ background:0 0; border:0; box-shadow:none; color:$(body.link.color); cursor:pointer; font-size:14px; font-weight:700; outline:0; text-decoration:none; text-transform:uppercase; width:auto } .dim-overlay{ background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.54); height:100vh; left:0; position:fixed; top:0; width:100% } #sharing-dim-overlay{ background-color:transparent } input::-ms-clear{ display:none } .blogger-logo,.svg-icon-24.blogger-logo{ fill:#ff9800; opacity:1 } .loading-spinner-large{ -webkit-animation:mspin-rotate 1.568s infinite linear; animation:mspin-rotate 1.568s infinite linear; height:48px; overflow:hidden; position:absolute; width:48px; z-index:200 } .loading-spinner-large>div{ -webkit-animation:mspin-revrot 5332ms infinite steps(4); animation:mspin-revrot 5332ms infinite steps(4) } .loading-spinner-large>div>div{ -webkit-animation:mspin-singlecolor-large-film 1333ms infinite steps(81); animation:mspin-singlecolor-large-film 1333ms infinite steps(81); background-size:100%; height:48px; width:3888px } .mspin-black-large>div>div,.mspin-grey_54-large>div>div{ background-image:url(https://www.blogblog.com/indie/mspin_black_large.svg) } .mspin-white-large>div>div{ background-image:url(https://www.blogblog.com/indie/mspin_white_large.svg) } .mspin-grey_54-large{ opacity:.54 } @-webkit-keyframes mspin-singlecolor-large-film{ from{ -webkit-transform:translateX(0); transform:translateX(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:translateX(-3888px); transform:translateX(-3888px) } } @keyframes mspin-singlecolor-large-film{ from{ -webkit-transform:translateX(0); transform:translateX(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:translateX(-3888px); transform:translateX(-3888px) } } @-webkit-keyframes mspin-rotate{ from{ -webkit-transform:rotate(0); transform:rotate(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:rotate(360deg); transform:rotate(360deg) } } @keyframes mspin-rotate{ from{ -webkit-transform:rotate(0); transform:rotate(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:rotate(360deg); transform:rotate(360deg) } } @-webkit-keyframes mspin-revrot{ from{ -webkit-transform:rotate(0); transform:rotate(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:rotate(-360deg); transform:rotate(-360deg) } } @keyframes mspin-revrot{ from{ -webkit-transform:rotate(0); transform:rotate(0) } to{ -webkit-transform:rotate(-360deg); transform:rotate(-360deg) } } .skip-navigation{ background-color:#fff; box-sizing:border-box; color:#000; display:block; height:0; left:0; line-height:50px; overflow:hidden; padding-top:0; position:fixed; text-align:center; top:0; -webkit-transition:box-shadow .3s,height .3s,padding-top .3s; transition:box-shadow .3s,height .3s,padding-top .3s; width:100%; z-index:900 } .skip-navigation:focus{ box-shadow:0 4px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12),0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0,0,0,.2); height:50px } #main{ outline:0 } .main-heading{ position:absolute; clip:rect(1px,1px,1px,1px); padding:0; border:0; height:1px; width:1px; overflow:hidden } .Attribution{ margin-top:1em; text-align:center } .Attribution .blogger img,.Attribution .blogger svg{ vertical-align:bottom } .Attribution .blogger img{ margin-$endSide:.5em } .Attribution div{ line-height:24px; margin-top:.5em } .Attribution .copyright,.Attribution .image-attribution{ font-size:.7em; margin-top:1.5em } .BLOG_mobile_video_class{ display:none } .bg-photo{ background-attachment:scroll!important } body .CSS_LIGHTBOX{ z-index:900 } .extendable .show-less,.extendable .show-more{ border-color:$(body.link.color); color:$(body.link.color); margin-top:8px } .extendable .show-less.hidden,.extendable .show-more.hidden{ display:none } .inline-ad{ display:none; max-width:100%; overflow:hidden } .adsbygoogle{ display:block } #cookieChoiceInfo{ bottom:0; top:auto } iframe.b-hbp-video{ border:0 } .post-body img{ max-width:100% } .post-body iframe{ max-width:100% } .post-body a[imageanchor="1"]{ display:inline-block } .byline{ margin-$endSide:1em } .byline:last-child{ margin-$endSide:0 } .link-copied-dialog{ max-width:520px; outline:0 } .link-copied-dialog .modal-dialog-buttons{ margin-top:8px } .link-copied-dialog .goog-buttonset-default{ background:0 0; border:0 } .link-copied-dialog .goog-buttonset-default:focus{ outline:0 } .paging-control-container{ margin-bottom:16px } .paging-control-container .paging-control{ display:inline-block } .paging-control-container .comment-range-text::after,.paging-control-container .paging-control{ color:$(body.link.color) } .paging-control-container .comment-range-text,.paging-control-container .paging-control{ margin-$endSide:8px } .paging-control-container .comment-range-text::after,.paging-control-container .paging-control::after{ content:"\b7"; cursor:default; padding-$startSide:8px; pointer-events:none } .paging-control-container .comment-range-text:last-child::after,.paging-control-container .paging-control:last-child::after{ content:none } .byline.reactions iframe{ height:20px } .b-notification{ color:#000; background-color:#fff; border-bottom:solid 1px #000; box-sizing:border-box; padding:16px 32px; text-align:center } .b-notification.visible{ -webkit-transition:margin-top .3s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1); transition:margin-top .3s cubic-bezier(.4,0,.2,1) } .b-notification.invisible{ position:absolute } .b-notification-close{ position:absolute; right:8px; top:8px } .no-posts-message{ line-height:40px; text-align:center } @media screen and (max-width:968px){ body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"][style*="float: left;"],body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"][style*="float: right;"]{ float:none!important; clear:none!important } body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"] img{ display:block; height:auto; margin:0 auto } body.item-view .post-body>.separator:first-child>a[imageanchor="1"]:first-child{ margin-top:20px } .post-body a[imageanchor]{ display:block } body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"]{ margin-left:0!important; margin-right:0!important } body.item-view .post-body a[imageanchor="1"]+a[imageanchor="1"]{ margin-top:16px } } .item-control{ display:none } #comments{ border-top:1px dashed rgba(0,0,0,.54); margin-top:20px; padding:20px } #comments .comment-thread ol{ margin:0; padding-left:0; padding-$startSide:0 } #comments .comment .comment-replybox-single,#comments .comment-thread .comment-replies{ margin-left:60px } #comments .comment-thread .thread-count{ display:none } #comments .comment{ list-style-type:none; entry.title: Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Latest News Updates: Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022
entry.content:
Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Latest News Updates: This year Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 will be conducted in two terms by the Jharkhand Academic Council. Jharkhand Board on the lines of CBSE has decided to conduct JAC Board Exam 2022 for Class 10 according to Term 1 and Term 2. Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Term will be held in 1st December, while Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Term will be held in 2nd March. Candidates who have registered for Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 can check Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Dates etc. Application Fee for Jharkhand Board Matric and Intermediate Exam Submission The last date for submission is 20 November 2021. Jharkhand Board 10th exam for term 1 will start from 7th December while Jharkhand Board 12th exam will start from 9th December. Jharkhand Board 10th 12th Exam 2022 Date Sheet will be released by Jharkhand Academic Council by 25th November.


News NEET Top Exam Tips College 

Notifications Get Instant News Updates ENABLEx Advertisement Home Exams  Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Jharkhand Board Exam 2022 will be in two terms, notice issued Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Jharkhand Board Exam 2022 will be in two terms, notice issued By Thursday,  [ Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Latest News Updates: This year Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 will be conducted in two terms by the Jharkhand Academic Council. Jharkhand Board on the lines of CBSE has decided to conduct JAC Board Exam 2022 for Class 10 according to Term 1 and Term 2. Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Term will be held in 1st December, while Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Term will be held in 2nd March. Candidates who have registered for Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 can check Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 Dates etc.

The last date for submission of application fee for Jharkhand Board Matric and Intermediate examination is 20 November 2021. Jharkhand Board 10th exam for term 1 will start from 7th December while Jharkhand Board 12th exam will start from 9th December. Jharkhand Board 10th 12th Exam 2022 Date Sheet will be released by Jharkhand Academic Council by 25th November. As per the official notification released by JAC, the first term exam will be conducted in the month of December 2021. Similarly, the second session exam will be conducted by the board in March-April 2022. The detailed exam dates will be released by JAC. on its official website-jac.jharkhand.gov.in. Jharkhand Board 10th Exam 2022 JAC Notice JAC Class 10 Board Exam 2022 Dates Online Registration without Late Fee : 27 October to 13 November 2021 Online Registration with Late Fee : 14 November to 20 November 2021 Jharkhand Board 10th Exam Date 2022 : 7 September 2021 Jharkhand Board 12th Exam Date 2022 Will Start From 9th December 2021 Also, candidates must note that Term 1 Exam will be based on Multiple Choice Questions and it will be conducted in OMR Sheet. For Term 2 exam, students will be asked short answer, very short answer, long answer type questions which are of descriptive type. A separate syllabus for both the term examinations will be prepared by the Jharkhand Council of Educational Research and Training or JCERT.

per the official notification, candidates can apply by logging in with their username and password. can fill. Also, it is to be noted that the notice registration number to be entered in the application form has to be filled by the head of the school. The registration number will be available on the checklist available on the portal.

entry.title: What is Seo How work | What is Search engine optimisation Full Forms of Seo
entry.content:
Search engine optimization tips have been written, I have taught them from my own experience and to help other bloggers like me, I have written SEO Tips In English in English as well as I have shared my experiences from the beginning till now with you so that whoever I made mistakes that you don't repeat.


SEO Tips In 2022 

I am fond of writing, due to which I thought that it should be made my job and I met some people who had to start a English site and they gave me a chance and we started our site Gujarat Yojanaa blogging but with the enthusiasm with which we started this site We did not get that much success of Start.[1]

As a writer I couldn't understand why this was happening when I had put all my strength into my work but there were few clicks in the day my boss always told me to be patient and assured me one day the site But somewhere they also thought that why the site is so slow

How to do [SEO Tips in 2022 

 Today I wrote SEO Tips In Hindi in this blog of mine so that the trouble that I faced should not happen to anyone else. Before telling about it, we are going to tell you about SEO. But if you have not created a website yet, then please do the way to create a website.

Full Form of SEO

The full form of SEO is 'Search Engine Optimization'.

What is SEO (What is Search Engine Optimization)

SEO is a web mining tool by which the query made by the users on the search engine i.e. whatever the user wants to search, gives the most suitable result to him. SEO tool gives a list of results according to keywords. SEO crawls the web pages for this, after which chooses the best result, which is called indexing of the page and for all this SEO uses robots / bots and spiders.A crawl visits each site, every page and selects the sites through hypertext links and then indexes the pages. In this way the index pages are stored in one place. After indexing, the result is given according to the query of the user, in which the most suitable result is given by matching the keywords of the query with the index pages.

 SEO Tips [SEO Tips and tricks]

 Money can be earned sitting at home through blogging, for which you should have the talent to write and with that the knowledge of search engine optimization SEO so that the blog you write is liked by Google and it is easily found during the search for the readers to read. . For this, first you have to know about SEO and while writing the article, some important points have to be included in your article as a rule. If you do this, then the traffic on your site will increase and more and more viewers will come to your site, which will improve the ranking of your site.

Importance of SEO

If you want to rank your website on Google and increase traffic in it, then the most important thing for you is SEO, because whatever you search on Google, if it is in your website then you will benefit from it, but if If it is not in your website then your website will not be able to rank. That's why SEO is very important for your website. How Search Engine Works (Overview Of Search Engine Optimization) Crawling is the first step that is done for the indexing of the web page, in which the web spider visits the hypertext pages and indexes the pages.

indexing

Collecting, parsing, and storing the data of whatever web pages are indexed during crawling comes under indexing, so that similar data is put together which is called indexing. The result obtained in the search engine is the web. Pages are selected from these index pages

matching

After indexing, the process of matching starts. When the user enters the query in the search engine, then the process of matching starts in which the SEO tool goes to the index pages and gives a list of web pages by matching the data according to the keywords of the query. He makes the choice from the meta description written in the web pages. This whole process is called matching. This was a small introduction to SEO, in which you can understand how an SEO deals with the user's query, but this whole process is robotic, for which some algorithms are used and any search engine keeps changing its algorithm. are So far, we have told how search engines deal on a user's query, but if you are a blogger and want to see your site in the top, then you have to follow some strategy.

How to do SEO

The website does not come easily and quickly in the top ten in the search engine, for this it takes time, the site should be about 6 months old and the process of crawling, indexing and matching should be done properly, for which you should follow the following rules.

Site Speed:

The better the speed of the site, the faster it works, the best frame work is to use it Press Genesis wordpress has come, whose speed is even better and the results are also many times better, so you should also use Genesis wordpress. To get which you click on this link.

Select writing area:

Choose a good area to write in which you are also interested and that is also read by the viewers, you will learn it gradually. Try to choose such a topic so that you can help someone because such topics are searched a lot. As you chose the area fitness news.

Create URL:

URL is most important, it is the crawling of your page, so choose it carefully and definitely put your keyword in the URL.

Keywords :

Now take out a short word from the selected area, like in today's news related to fitness, weight loss is more searched, so your keyword will be to lose weight. This is how you chose your keyword.

Keyword use:

Use keywords in your data many times but not too much. It is because of keywords that the search engine understands on which topic this page is because I already told that search engine optimization is a robotic process, it does not have human sense. That's why keywords and URLs are made after a lot of thought.

Keyword position in data

  •  The URL must be in the keyword.
  •  Keyword should be in title and sub title.
  •  The keyword should be in the name of the image.
  •  Keyword should be in meta description.

 Blog Length:

Don't skimp on blogging. The more detail you write, the better. Keep the following things in mind in the blog.

Create sub title in blog.

Speak your point in points.Use good language, simple language to explain things easily.

Create Headings:

Create sub-headings inside the data so that you can tell your point in detail and it will also be easy for the readers to read. Write sub headings in different colors. Bold and italicize headings and important words. Try to put keywords in sub headings too

Enter the link of related pages:

 By putting a link to your own site on your page, the site is linked internally, which helps in crawling. And it is easy for search engines to index the page. This process is called grouping.

Create external link:

 Put a link of a popular site on your site, but only putting a related link in the related content will benefit.

Make Bake Linux:

 To put the URL of your site on another good site, you can request them or you can put the URL of your page by commenting in their comment box, it is called Beck Linux. Increase comments: The more comments you have in your post, the more success you will get, so write such posts that readers are forced to comment.

 Join social website:

 Create a page of your site on social websites like Facebook, Twitter, and Google Plus etc. This is the most direct, easy and cheap way of promoting the site because there are more chances of getting regular readers from the social website itself.

Maintain regularity

 Make a strategy of how many Bolg posts will be posted on the site in a month and work accordingly because it affects the ranking of the site, even if you put an article in a day or two to three days, but whatever you decide, execute it. Must do

Update data:

 Update the old written blog from time to time and add new data to it.

Meta Description:

 Write a meta description of your blog, in which write a summary of your blog in about 150 words. This makes SEO easy to match.

meta keywords:

 Put important keywords of your blog and its synonyms in meta keywords.

 Types of SEO

 There are usually 2 types of SEO, On Page SEO and Off Page SEO. Both types of SEO are very important for any website. Where on-page SEO makes the site strong on Google, off-page SEO strengthens the site's backup. The most important thing on the site is to increase the traffic and for that there are two important factors which are very important to take care of and that is on page and off page SEO. Now let's know what these two are and how they work.

On Page SEO –

 After doing some keyword research of the topic related to which we prepare our site, we write similar content and put it on our website. According to the search engine optimization on the website, we also have to do some setting so that we can set up the contact and prepare it to rank in Google. Only after setting up on page helps in bringing organic traffic to a website.

On Page SEO Factors

 There are some important factors to set up the website's on page, which we will tell you about here: - Website design :- Website design matters a lot in on page setting, the design you are using on your website How is it whether it is according to Google's algorithm or not. According to Google's algorithm, the design of your website should be very simple and define your theme.

Website Speed:- The speed of your website should also be very good because it has a very important contribution in on-page setting. The speed of the website should be very good to get your website in good place in Google and to bring organic traffic. Your website speed should be at least above 80.

Website Structure: - The structure of your website shows what topic your website is related to, so prepare the structure of your website well to tell Google about your website. When the structure of your website will tell Google about your website, then easily your website starts ranking in Google.

 Website Favicon: – A small icon is placed on your website to show the topic about which your website is related, which identifies your website. If you open any site, you will see a small icon with Shahid's name, it is called favicon.

 Mobile Friendly Website :- In today's time everyone uses internet on mobile so if your website is mobile friendly then you will get organic traffic very soon. That is why it is very important to make your website mobile friendly.

 Title Tag: – Contact is very important on your website, in such a situation it is very important to have a title tag on it, which gives information related to your website or blog to Google. The title tag describes your content as to which topic your content is related to.

 Meta description: – It is very important to have a meta description in any content or block, which tells about what is told on that page or website of yours. There is a separate option in WordPress's site to add meta description and it is added with the help of coding in other sites.

 Keyword Density:- It is very important to take care of keyword density in any contact for setting on page. According to Google's algorithm, some keyword density is determined in a content, accordingly it is mandatory to put keywords in your contact. Only after setting on page according to Google algorithm, your site is quickly crawled in Google and gets organic traffic.

 Image All Tag: – Whose word you have used in your content, if you use it in Image All tag too then it gets crawled in Google very soon. This is a very important feature of on page setting. Whatever you put the image in the middle of the content, you must put the keyword all tag in it so that your image along with your contact can also be set according to the on page setting.

 URL Structure: – How is the URL structure of your contact or website, it is also very important to see in the on page setting. The URL shows which page of your website or blog is about which topic.

 Internal Link :- By interlinking one of your blocks with other blocks, the traffic of your website goes from one blog to another block, which helps in increasing the traffic. Interlinking is very necessary to generate more traffic and on page setting.

 Highlight Important Keywords :- Whatever important keywords you have used in your content, be sure to highlight them, so that Google sees those keywords and crawls that block of yours easily and quickly.

 Use Heading Tags: – Whenever you post by writing a contact in WordPress, you must have seen that some heading tags also come there. Commonly used heading tags range from H1 to H6. Whatever is the main part of your content, put it in the h1 tag and put the rest in other h-tags according to their need. This will also make your content attractive and help on page.

 Post Good Length :- In on page setting it matters a lot how many words you have used in your content. Your content should be on any topic, all the information related to that topic should be in your post, it is necessary to prepare a content of at least 2000 words according to on-page SEO.

 Google Site Map: - To take your blog or post to the search engine, a link to your blog or post is inserted in the Google Site Map so that your blog can reach Google's search engine quickly.

 Check Broken Links: - Sometimes some points or links are missed during the post, due to which the link of your post or block is broken, such links are not crawled in Google, so blogs or posts posted on your website from time to time Keep checking the link.

 SEO Friendly URL :- The URL of your contact should be SEO friendly which means short, easy and meaning full. So that they can easily reach the searchers. Meaning if someone searches in Google, then easily crawl your URL and reach the person searching.

 Google Analytics: – It is very important to connect your website with Google Analytics to get information about how many readers come to which blog on your website and at what time.

 Social Media Buttons: - Your website page should have all the buttons related to social media so that if any reader finds your post and likes it, then he can easily share it on his social media account.

 HTML Page Size: - If your website is on HTML then it is very important to have its page size according to Google algorithm. This is an important factor in the On setting.

 Clear Page Cache: – Sometimes when the answer is petroled on Google, then a little bit of garbage comes in it, which is called cookies or cache. On your website or blog, it is very important to clean it from time to time.

 Website Security Https etc :- It is your responsibility to take care of the security of your website and blog. There are many hackers and haters who can damage or even block your website. In such a situation, it is only in your hands to keep your website safe. Off Page SEO –

 To promote the link of your website on Google, some work is done on the back end which comes in off page SEO. Off Page SEO is very important for any website and there are many ways to do it off page.

Off Page SEO Activities

 Apart from this, some other activities also come in off page SEO such as :-

Guest Posting: - The meaning of guest posting in simple and simple words is that by going to another good blogger friend website who runs a website related to your topic, posting a g Guest Posting ood content on it, in which you can do interlinking of your website. This is called guest posting. With this, your website gets a very powerful backlink. Which is also known as long term and quality backlinks for your website.

 Form Posting: - There are many such websites on Google where you can do form posting to promote your website. Such sites crawl your site's link in Google and quickly reach the top ranking.

 Blog Commenting: - There are many such sites on Google, where you can make a good backlink by commenting the link of your website. Which work off page on your website.

 Other Activities :- Apart from this, there are some other activities which come in off page submission such as- blog directory submission, search engine submission, classified submission site, video sharing site, photo sharing site, question answering site.

 By visiting all these sites, you can promote the keywords and links of your blog or website, which gives very good off-page backlinks to your website. You can easily find sites related to all these submissions in Google.

SEO Technique Types

 Usually SEO is done in 2 ways for any website, meaning there are two types of SEO techniques:-

White hat SEO :-

 Creating backlinks for your website in a search engine optimization method comes in white hat SEO. This method of SEO is known as the best technique.

Black hat SEO :-

 This is a technique in which any website is done wrongly to rank in Google. Back links created without following the guideline of the search engine are not good and they all come under black hat SEO.

SEO Websites

 According to SEO, some websites can help you to increase traffic to your site like –

Social Networking Sites

 There are many platforms of social media where you can do off page SEO by sharing your blog and website. Some social media sites are as follows –

Facebook :- Who does not use Facebook in today's time, you will find people of all ages on Facebook. In such a situation, from Facebook, you can gain very good traffic on your website and blog. If you share your post or blog on Facebook, then you also get off page backlink from there.

 Facebook page: - Creating a Facebook ID is very easy, in the same way a Facebook page is also created, if you share your blog and post by creating a Facebook page similar to the name of your website or blog, then gradually your followers increase. And also like your post.

 Facebook Groups: - There are many such groups on Facebook where you can bring traffic by sharing your post. There are many bloggers out there who share their posts in those groups and exchange traffic by visiting each other's posts.

 Twitter: - In today's time through Twitter, everyone works to share their thoughts and new ideas by themselves. There are many bloggers who bring a lot of traffic to their website by sharing their blog or any product through Twitter. Posting on Twitter is the best part of off page SEO.

 Google Plus: – Google Plus BX is a social networking site that gives a little bit of the same features as Facebook. Although not many people know about it, but many people use it. This is also a platform where you can get off page backlinks for your website for free.

 Social Bookmarking Sites

 Apart from these, there are some social bookmarking sites on which by creating off page backlinks, your site can be brought to the top ranking of Google.

Tumblr / Tumblr :- This is a social media platform where you can create your account and bring traffic by sharing your posts, blogs or new thoughts. This is the best social bookmarking site for off page seo.

 Pinterest / Pinterest: – Interest is also a great site for social bookmarking, where you can promote your site through images and the content posted on this site is quickly crawled in Google.

Diggo: is also a social bookmarking site with good domain authority and ratings, where you can easily create backlinks by sharing links to content blocks on your side, etc.

There are other social bookmarking sites:- Digg, LinkedIn, Reddit, Stumbleupon, Delicious etc. On which you can increase the domain rating and page authority of your blog or website by doing off page SEO for your website.

In SEO Tips, I have put all the points that I use in my blog and after that I have seen better results.

There is less competition in Bengali, so it is not very difficult to get into Google's top ten list in this, but for that it is necessary to use SEO tips carefully. The work is not completed only by writing a blog, for that it is necessary to take the help of SEO Tips written above, as well as writing such blogs is always beneficial which help others. Also, always keep yourself updated because any search engine keeps changing its algorithm. So far, Google, which is the most used search engine, has not told about any specific algorithm for Hindi, so now all those SEO tips are being used which are 

done by other English sites, its much better. The results have been received but as the competition in Hindi increases, the search engines will work on the new algorithm for Hindi also. So we will always need to be alert and updated.

link.title: What is Seo How work | What is Search engine optimisation Full Forms of Seo

category.term: How to install and Active and delete a wordpress theme

entry.title: How to Install, Activate and Delete a Theme in WordPress 2022
entry.content:
How to Install, Activate and Delete a Theme in WordPress How to Install, Activate and Delete WordPress Theme in english 


Word Press is a free and open source content management system that works under PHP and MySQL. To make any website beautiful and to make WordPress beautiful, a theme is added to it. There are many ways to add a theme to it. Themes can be added to WordPress from Dashboard or FTP software. Here the topic of WordPress theme will be discussed, in which the description of WordPress plugin and installation will also be there.

installing_wp_themes

We have already told you how to install WordPress website on Dreamhost. Now we will tell you that there are many such places for WordPress theme from where it can be downloaded. The best is 'WordPress Theme Club'. Apart from this, WordPress themes can also be found from many such WordPress free theme directories with the help of WP Board, or the theme can be added to WordPress by downloading a zip file. You can also edit WordPress themes using the Theme Test Drive plugin.

WordPress Theme Guide

First of all, download the WordPress theme of your choice and save it in a folder as per your convenience. Many premium theme clubs download themes in a zip file. Here are two ways to add a theme to WordPress-

With the help of Dashboard (Theme Installation by Dashbo):

First, log in to the WordPress dashboard. Here go to the option of 'Appearance'. In this option one option is of theme. After going to the theme option, there is an option of 'Add New'.There click on the option of Upload Theme. By clicking on it, you will also have the option to browse and upload the theme. Click on it to go to the place where you have saved the theme of the zip file.Once you have selected the theme and clicked on the 'Install Now' option, the theme you have chosen for your WordPress starts uploading.Before activating the theme for your WordPress, you have a chance to preview. Through this, you will be able to decide how the theme uploaded by you is looking in your word.Every time the WordPress preview does not come right and there may be some errors in it. So if this is not your live site then you can upload your theme in full and see it.

Theme Installation by FTP

Themes can also be added or edited in WordPress with the help of FTP. This proves to be most effective when your server security hinders you from using the Dashboard to create themes and plugins. If an error appears when you upload a theme from the dashboard, then the theme can be inserted into your WordPress using FTP. The method of installing themes via FTP is called 'Manual WordPress Theme Installation'.

You need FTP software to upload themes with its help. This work can be done with the help of Filezilla or Cpanel. Apart from this, it is also very important for you to have WINRAR software, which proves to be helpful in opening ZIP files. If your system does not have WinRAR then it is necessary to download such software from a good website. Using this method, we first extract the theme from the zip and save it in our theme folder.

How to activate WordPress theme

Once the themes are uploaded with the help of Dashboard or FTP, these themes can also be browsed later with the help of WP Dashboard. For this, go to the Appearance option shown on the screen, in this option there will be an option of  Themes', where you will get all the themes that you have uploaded. You can also use these built-in themes for your WordPress whenever you want.

How to delete WordPress theme 

Like the two ways to add a theme, there are two ways to remove a theme. Below both the methods are given one by one.For this, you can first use the 'Appearance' option of WordPress. Here there is an option to delete in the theme option. By going to that option, the existing theme can be deleted very easily. But it is not right to delete directly. First choose another theme and then remove the existing theme on the pretext of uploading it. For this, FTP manager can also be used, where the theme can be removed with the help of wp content or theme option. Although the dashboard is very convenient to use.

link.title: How to Install, Activate and Delete a Theme in WordPress 2022

entry.title: Russia, which is facing sanctions, has appealed to India
entry.content:
Russia wants India to increase imports of oil and petroleum product Russia wants to expand the sales network of Russian companies in India India is the third largest economy in Asia Russia has appealed for help from India amid the ongoing war with Ukraine. 


According to a Reuters report, Russia has appealed to India to increase its investment in the oil and gas sector of Moscow, which is affected by the sanctions. Russia, the third-largest economy in Asia, also wants to expand the sales network of Russian companies in India. The Russian economy is currently facing its biggest crisis since the dissolution of the Soviet Union in 1991.

Russia's invasion of Ukraine has put the Russian economy in a difficult position, with Western nations imposing tougher sanctions on Russia. Western nations have pressured India to protest Russia's military action against Ukraine, but India has so far refrained from speaking out against Russia. In the midst of all this, Russia wants India to increase its investment in Russia.

 Russia Ukraine War Today


Russia's Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak has said that exports of Russian oil and petroleum products to India have reached close to 1 1 billion. There is an opportunity for India to increase this figure of imports. Novak has told India's Petroleum and Natural Gas Minister Hardeep Singh Puri that he wants to attract Indian investment.

India has told the UN Security Council that any case relating to its obligations under the Biological and Toxic Weapons Convention should be addressed with the parties concerned in consideration and co-operation. India made the remarks during a UNSC briefing on Ukraine amid allegations made by Russia about American biological programs. The United States has denied Russia's allegations that Ukraine is operating chemical and biological laboratories with US support, following Russia's request for a Security Council meeting.

 "We are constantly concerned about the situation in Ukraine," said TS Krishnamurthy, India's Permanent Representative to the United Nations. Organic

link.title: Russia, which is facing sanctions, has appealed to India

Google Adsense ka Approval kaise le
Google Adsense ka Approval kaise le 2022

entry.title: Google Adsense approval Tips in 2022 | Google Adsense Approval kaise le in 2022 | How to Get Google Adsense Approval
entry.content:
Google AdSense ka approval Lena Muskil to hai lekin jyada mushkil bhi nahin Hai Google AdSense approval lene ke liye alag alag factor per Dhyan Dena Hota Hai. Google AdSense ek advertising company Google AdSense ka approval lene ke bahut sare factor ko Dhyan mein rakhte hue kaam karna hota hai. Kya ko pata hai Google Adsense Ka aproval Kaise le 2022 Me Sab kuchh janne ke liye bane rahe humare is Post Pe To Chaliye Shuruaat Karte hai. Usse pehle jante Hai ki Google Adsense Kya hota Hai. 





Google Adsense Kya Hai [ What Is Google Adsense ] 


Google AdSense ek advertiser Company hai dosto Google Adsense google ka hi ek Company Hai. Advertising company ke roop mein kaam karta hai Google AdSense Jo bade bade company ke sath milkar kam karta hai Google AdSense ka kam yah rahata hai ki Google Adsense apni ads ki madad Se website ya fir YouTube par ads Show kar wata hai. Google Adsense unh badi company se paise lekar ads ki madad se product promote karwata Hai. Google Adsense 2 tarike se kam karta hai pahla to YouTube ya fir website ya blogger par ads show karke ya fir Aur bhi bahut sare tarike hai lekin jo main Tarika hai vah maine aapko Bata Diya.


Google Adsense approval For beginner ( Blogger ) 


Doston Google AdSense ke upar approval lena Na Koi badi Baat To nahin Hai bahut se log sochte hai ki Blogger par approval lene me problem aati hai lekin Aesa nahi Hota Jab tak aapka Accha Content Nahi Ho Tab Tak aapko Google Adsense approval Nahi deta Hai Fir aap Konse bi Platform Kyu na Ho. Google Adsense Apne Rules Aur Policy Ko Change karte Rehta Hai. Aap ne Kahi baar dekha Hoga Ki Kisi kisi ko 10 Post me bi Google Adsense ka Approval mil jata hai. Google Adsense aapki Content Ki Quality Check karta hai Agar Usko acchi lagi to Approval de deta hai. to Apne Content Ko unique Aur faas sustra banaye kabi bi Coy paste Na kare Jis se Google Adsense approval lene me Bhi dhikat na Aaye Asaani se approval Mil jayega.


Google Adsense approval for blogspot Free Domain [ Blogger ] 


Dosto blogger par Approval lene ke liye domain Important Nahi hota Aap Free Domain par bhi Approval Le sakte Ho Bus aapka Content Accha Hona chaiye Agar aapka Content Accha nahi Hai to aap Domain leke bi Approval Nahi karwa sakte hai. Dosto Domain To sirf apni Site ko Rank kar wane ke liye kaam aata hai Kyu ki Domains ke wajah se hi aap Kisi bhi Website ko Rank kar wa sakte hai. Lekin aapko bud approval ki kar wana hai To aap blogspot .com ka Sahara le sakte hai Ye ekdum Free Domain Hai. Bahut se Log bolte hai ki google adsense ka Approval lene ke liye Aapko Kam se kam 1000 Words aur 30 Post Lihk na Hota hai Jabi aapko Approval Milega Lekin Aesa Nahi hota Hai. agar aapka Content google Adsense ki pasand aaya to Woh sirf 10 ya fir 12 post me Approval De deta Hai. 


WordPress par Google Adsense ka Approval Kaise le [ WordPress ] 


Dosto baat Agar wordpress ki kare to Yaha pe aapko Jaldi Approval mil jata hai. approval Milne ki wajah Ye nahi hoti hai ki aap WordPress Use kar rahe ho Ya fir wordpress par Approval Jaruri hi hai. Aesa nahi hai Bus itna hota hai ki WordPress par jadah Option Hote hai Blogger se aur bahut acche theme Bi aapko Mil jate hai wordpress par Isliye Jahdah Option ki wajah se Aapko waha pe approval lene ke Koi dikkat ka Samna Nahi karna padta. 

WordPress me Jadah customise Hone ke wajah se Website Jadah Unique Lagti hai Isi liye Google Adsense usko approval de deta hai. lekin Bahut sare Logo ki WordPress par bi Google Adsense ka Approval lene me Dikkat ka Samna karna padta hai. Google Adsense me baar baar apni site ko review me dalte Rehte hai fir bhi Google Adsense Reject Hi kar deta hai. iska Sulution Ek hi hai ki aapka Content me Kuch Problem hi.jab tak aap apna content ko accha nahi Banayege tak tab aapko Google Adsense Reject hi karega. 


Google Adsense Approval for YouTube  2022 How to get Google Adsense approval in [ YouTube ]


Dosto agar hum YouTube ki baat kare to youtube ka Pura Tarika hi  Alag hai Google AdSense ka approval Lena ka kyu ki YouTube ka Criteria Website ya fir Blogger se alag hai Youtube me aapko Video bana na Padti hai Acche se Aur aapko 2 Criteria complete karna padta hai. Jo ki pehla hai 

1) 4000 hours Time complete karna hota hai. Matlab aapki YouTube ki saare Videos milake 4000 hours Ka time Complete karna hota hai aur dusre ki baat kare to.

2) 1000 Subscriber Complete karna hota hai matlab aapki Video ko 1000 Log Subcribe karege to aapka ye criteria complete ho jaega.


Uske bad YouTube aapke channel ko review karta hai agar use lagta hai ki is ko monetize karna hai to aapke channel ko monetize kar deta hai. Nahi to Reject kar deta hai. 


Google Adsense se paise kaise kamaye How to get Money From Google Adsense 


Dosto Google Adsense 3 Platform se Apni Revenue Share karta hai 1 hai Youtube 2 Hai Blogger Aur 3 Hai wordpress Blogger aur wordpress par Revenue share karne ke liye Google Adsense Google ki ads Ka use karta hai Matlab Google adwords ki jariye website par ya fir Blogger par ads Show kar wake agar aap janna Chahte hai ki Google adwords kya hai To aap muje Comments karke bata de me iske upper bi post Lihk dunga. Dosto kaise ke aapko mene bataya ki Google Adsense ka Approval lene ke baad hi aap apne Blogs ya fir website par Google Adsense ki Ads Ko Show karwa sakte Ho. To aapko Google Adsense Aapki website par Google ki ads Show karwata hai Aur usse Jo Revenue Generate hota hai usse aada Woh Rakh leta hai aur aada aapko De deta hai. Adsesne aapke Revenue se 45% Woh Rakh leta hai aur 55% Aapko De deta hai. 


Ye to rahi Website Ki baat Lekin aap Youtuber ho to aapko Google Adsense se paise kamane ke liye apne YouTube channel ko Monetize kar wana padta hai aur jaise ke mene aap logo ko bataya ki youtube se paise kamane ke liye aapko 1000 Subscriber aur 4000h Time ki jarurat padati hai Ye criteria complete hone ke bad Google Adsense aapke YouTube channel ko review karta hai. Agar usse laga ki iski approval de sakte hai to mil jata hai. Ab baat karte hai ki google adsense se Paise Withdraw Kaise kare to Chaliye jante hai.


Google Adsense ka payment apni Bank me Kaise le [ How to get Google AdSense payment in Bank account 


Dusto agar baat kare Google AdSense ki payment bank account me kaise le ki to iske liye bi ek criteria Hai jab tak aapke Account me $100 Dollar Nahi hoge tab Tak aapko Google Adsense ka payment Nahi Milega. payment lene ke liye aapko $100 Dollar karne ki jarurat Hogi Jaise hi aapke $100 Ho jaye hai to aapko Google Adsense payment kar deta hai. Dosto Google Adsense ka payment lene ke liye aapko Apni Bank ka Swift Code ki Jarurat padti hai. Lekin ye Swift Code hota kya hai. dosto Swift Code international payment lene ke liye kam Aata Hai yah sabhi Bank ke pass Hota Hai lekin $100 dollar karne se pahle aapko aapka address verification ke liye 10 dollar karna Hota Hai. Jaise hi aapka $10 dollar ho jaaye to aapko adress per Ek pin verification  ke liye Aata Hai Jaise vah Pin verify Ho jata hai to aap aage ki process ko complete kar Sakte Ho. Doston bahut sari logon ke dimag mein yah khyal jarur hota hun OK Google Adsense ke liye best bank kaun si hoti hai. To vah bhi ham Jaan lete.


Best Bank For Google Adsense | Google Adsense ke liye Accha bank konsa hai 


Dosto wese to india me Bahut se Acche bank Hai jo international Payment ki accept karta hai Lekin Jo bahut se log istemal karte hai. Woh bank ki me aapko puri list bata deta hu. 


  • States bank Of india 
  • Bank of Baroda
  • Bank of India
  • ICICI bank 
  • Punjab National Bank
  • Reserve Bank of India 

Dosto ye jo bank mene aap logo ko bataya hai ye sabi bank bahut acchi hai lekin me aapko Recommend Karuga ki aap SBI Matlab States bank of india Ye bank ka Charge bi babut kam lagta hai. 


Consultation 


Dosto aaj ke post me mene aap logo ko bataya kaise aap Google Adsense ka Approval le sakte hai sath me ye bhi bataya ki kaise aap YouTube Ka Channel ko Monetize kar sakte hai sath me bataya kaise aap WordPress ka Approval le sakte hai and Bataya kaise aap Blogger ke Free domain Par Approval le sakte hai. muje Ummid hai ki aapko ye post Se kuch sikhne ko mila Hoga. 



.

entry.title: Ye hai India ka Sabse Haunted village | Indian ka Sabse Hounted Village Konsa hai | Indian Most Hounted village
entry.content:
Hello dosto aaj ke post me hum Janne wale hai india ka sabse Haunted village ke baare. India ka Sabse Haunted Village Konsa hai. india ka sabse Khatarnak Village Konsa Hai India ka Sabse Haunted Gaon Ke baare me Janne wale hai To Bane rahe Humare Post Me. 

Photo by : Bharattime.com

Bhangarh Dosto Bhangarh Rajeshthan Rajgarh Alwar City ka Ek Chota Sa Gaon Hai  Bhangarh Kila Ek haunted kila kaha Jata hai ye india ka Sabse Haunted Village And kila Hai. Aur Bhangarh Ek ancient City bi Kaha jata hai. Bhangarh ek Mysteries Jagah Hai. dosto Bhangarh Village ke Baare me kaha jata hai ki Bhangarh Village Me Aaj se 500 Saal Phele 1573 Me Bhangarh ke Raja Bhagwat Das ne Banaya tha. Fir 300 saal baad 1867 Me Raja Savai Man Singh ke chote bhai Raja Madhu Singh ne Bhangarh Ko Apnaya tha.


bhangarh mystery story


Dosto Kehte hai ki Bhangarh Ki Rajkumari Rani Ratnawati Bahut hi Khubsurat Thi. Rajkumari Itni Khubsurat thi ki Pure Rajya Me Rajkumari Ratnawati Ki Khubsurati Tarif Hoti Thi. Lekin Rajkumari Ratnawati ke piche Ek Tantrik Baba Pad gaya tha Woh Rajkumari Ratnawati ko Hasil karna chahta tha Lekin Rajkumari Ratnawati Usko Taraf Palat kar dekhti bi Nahi Thi. Lekin Woh baba Ek Tantrik Tha Woh Kala Jadhu ko Janta tha. ek din Rajkumari Ratnawati Apne Seheliyo Ke sath Bazaar Jati Hai Rajkumari Ratnawati ek Ittar Ki Dukan par ittar lene keliye jati hai. Waha pe Woh Tantrik Baba bi Aa jata hai Woh apne kale Jadhu se Rajkumari Ratnawati ko apne kale Jadhu se Wash me karne ki koshish Karta Hai Lekin Kisi wajah se ho Nakam ho jata hai 


Lekin ek din Rajkumari Ratnawati Uss Tantrik Baba ke Jaal me Fas hi jati hai. Lekin waha se bhi Jaise taise karke Rajkumari Ratnawati baag jati hai Lekin woh tantrik ki wahi pe Mout Ho jati hai. Woh Tantrik marne se Pehle Rajkumari Ratnawati ko Srafh deta hai. Tum aur tumare is bhangarh kile me rehne Wale Sabi logo ki mout Ho jayegi aur marne ke baad Tumari Aatma Isi Kile me Rehegi. Dosto kaha jata hai ki Rajakumari Ratnawati ki Aatma Abhi Bhi Bhangarh Kile me Gumti Rehti hai.


Bangarh Fort kaise Jaye 


Dosto Bhangarh Fort Jane ke liye aap Bus aur train ke jariye ja sakte hai. Bhangarh Rajgarh Alwar Se Judha hua Hai. Aap Alwar City ke Railway station ke jariye Aa sakte Hai. alwar Se Lahkbak 90k dur hai jo aap bus ke jariye Bi ja sakte hai. Aisi ke sath bhangarh Fort Ek tourist palace bhi ban chuka hai Yaha pe duniya bar Ke log Aate hai. Dosto Yaha pe Aane ka Time Hai Shuba 6 am Se Syaam 6 pm Tak Ye khula Hota hai. Dosto Usse jadah Time tak kisi ko bi Rukne ki ijazat Nahi Hai.

entry.title: Ye Hai Duniyaa ke 10 Khatarnak Snake | Duniya Ke 10 Sabse khatarnak Snakes 2022 | 10 Dengerous Snake In the World
entry.content:
Dosto aaj ke Post hum Janne Wale Hai duniye ke 10 Khatarnak Snake ke baare jo ki Kisi ko bi Mintto me Mar De. Aaj ke Post hum Duniya ke Unh Khatarnak saap ke bare mein jaane wali hai jo Duniya mein sabse Khatarnak Snakes mein aate Hain Duniya Ke 10 sabse Khatarnak snake kaun se hai Ke baare me Janne wale hai. Duniya Ke 10 sabse Khatarnak saap ke bare mein ab jaane wale.To chaiye Shuru karte hai Duniya ke 10 Khatarnak Snake.

10 Taipan 



TAIPAN snake dakshin Australia mein paya jata hai ye snake Ye Australia ka dusra sabse Khatarnak saamp hai. Iska colour thoda golden all thoda brown colour ka hota hai. 1.6M se 2m Tak ho sakti Hai. Ye Sanke Duniya Ki Sabse Khatarnak saap aur mein Aata seHai thoda bahut black Mamba jaisa bhi dikhta Hai jo dakshin Africa mein dekh ne ki milta hai Aur agar Is hisab ke bare mein jana jaaye to ye samp 

  • Colour brown
  • Venom Yes 
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 1.6m To 2m 
  • Death By Snake 80,000 To 138,000 people Per Year's
  • Origin Australia
  • Species Reptiles 

9 Black Mamba 



Black mamba Duniya Ke sabse Khatarnak saapo mein se ek Hai. black mamba North America And South Africa me Paya Jata. black Mamba ki Lambai 2m se 2.5m Tak hoti hai. Aur agar Iske colour baat Kiya jaye to Jaise ke iske naam se hi Jana ja sakta hai. Black Mamba Pura Black colour ka hoga hai. Ab baat karte hai iske Venom ke baare me Dosto Black Mamba Ka Venom neurotoxic Hota Hai Is ke jehar se Ek sath 3 Log Mar sakte hai Aur ilaj na hone ke karan se Mot bi ho sakti hai.

  • Colour Balck 
  • Venom Yes
  • Venom Type neurotoxic 
  • Height 1.5m to 2m 
  • Death by Snake 20,000 To 25,000 people Per Year's
  • Origin Africa 
  • Species Reptiles

8 Tiger Snakes 



Yah bhi Australia mein paye Jane Wale  sabse danger Snake mein se ek hote hai Tiger Snakes Ki baat Kiya Jaye to Tiger Snake ki Lambai 1m se 1.5m tak ki hoti hai. ye Samp Me bhi neurotoxic Venom Paya Jata hai. is Snake ki dil ka Dora Heartbreat jadah hona aur muh se khoon Nikalne Lakta hai. agar Waqt Rehte Insaan ko Bachaya Nahi gaya to Insaan ki Mout Bi Ho sakti hai. 

  • Colour Black And Yellow mix 
  • Venom Yes 
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 1m to 1.5m
  • Death by Snake 50 to 80 People per Year 
  • Origin Australia
  • Species Reptiles

7 Philippines cobra



Phillipines Cobra Indian Cobra se kam Venomous Hota hai Lekin uttari Asia mein paye Jane Wale sabse Khatarnak saap mein se ek hai. ye samp me neurotoxic hota Insaan ko 24h se Pehle ki mar deta hai agar Waqt Rehte Ilaj nahi kiya Gaya to Insaan ki mout Ho jati hai. Phillipines Cobra ka colour Black aur White Hota hai Phillipines Cobra ki Height 3m se 3.5m tak ho sakti hai Aisi ke sath Philippines cobra duniya ka Dusra Sabse lamba Snake ban Jata hai.

  • Colour Black And White 
  • Venom Yes
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 3.m to 3.5m 
  • Death by Snake 100,000 people Per Year's
  • Origin Philippine
  • Species Reptiles 

6 death Adder



Death Adder Australia mein paye jane wala saamp hai. Ye samp Duniya ke sabse Chote Snakes me Aate hai. Ye Samp Ki height Sirf 0.50m se 0.80m Tak hi hoti hai aur in ka Weight 150 Gram se 200 Gram Tak hota hai. Ye Snake ka venom neurotoxic Hota hai. Jo kisi insaan ki mout sirf 10h me Le sakta hai. 

  • Colour orange 
  • Venom Yes
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 0.50m to 0.80m 
  • Weight 100g to 150g
  • Death by Snake 1,000 To 5,000 People per Year 
  • Origin Australia
  • Species type Reptiles 

5 Saw Scaled Viper



Saw Scaled Viper Asia Ka sabse Khatarnak saap hai. Ye samp viper species Me aata hai. Ye saap ki height lagbhag 1m se 2m tak ki ho sakti hai. Yah sab Asia ke sabse Khatarnak saamp hamen shumar Hota Hai. Ye saap ka venom neurotoxic Hota Hai.

  • Colour Yellow white and Black 
  • Venom Yes
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 1m to 2m 
  • Death by Snake 100,000 To 500,000 People per Year 
  • Origin Africa South Asia
  • Species Reptiles

4 Rattle Snakes



RATTLE SNAKE Duniya Ke sabse Khatarnak saap mein shumar hai Rattel Snake America me Paya jata hai. Rattel Snake ki Height 1m Se 1.5m Tak hoti hai Rattel Snake ki Puch par ek Bach ne wala Rattel Hota hai Jab is Saap ko dar lagta hai to ye saap apni Puch ko Hilata hai Jis se ek Rattel ki Aawaz aane lagti hai. 

Ye aawaz Ek Chetawani hai ki Rattel Snake apne Aas pass hai. Rattel Snake Duniya ke Unh Khatarnak Snake me Shamil hota hai Jo sirf 10 se 12 Ghante me Insaan ki Jaan mout ke leta hai. Rattel Snake me neurotoxic Venom Paya Jata hai. Rattel Snake bahut hi Gussel Snake hota hai. Rattel Snake ki bite ki speed Babut Fast hoti. Rattel Snake jadatar Chuhe Aur Chote janwaro ko khata hai. Aur ye Snake se Har saal 7,000 se 8,000 Logo ki Mout hoti hai.

  • Colour dark Yellow 
  • Venom Yes 
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 0.50m to 1m 
  • Death' by Snake 7,000 to 8,000 people Per Year's 
  • Origin America 
  • species Reptiles

3 Eastern Brown Snake 



Eastern Brown Snake Australia mein paya jata hai Eastern Brown Snake bahut jadah venom hota hai ye Snake duniye ke Unh Snake me Shamil hai jo Sirf kuch Ghanto me Insaan ki Jaan le sakte hai. Snake Australia public Ilake me babut jadah paya jata hai Ye snake Se har saal 1,000 se jadah logo ki mout Ho jati hai. ye Snake ka Venom Neurotoxic Hota hai. 

  • Colour Black 
  • Venom Yes
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 1m Above 
  • Death' by Snake 1,000 people Per Year's 
  • Origin Australia
  • Species Reptiles

2 inland Taipan 



Inland Taipan Sab Saapo ka Baap bol sakte hai. kyu ki ye SNAKE Duniya ka sabse Khatarnak Snake kaha Jata hai. Ye snake Khatarnak ke sath sath Furtila aur jandar snake Hota hai. ye snake indian Cobra Ke baad Sabse Khatarnak Snake mana jata hai. ye Snake Ke Venom se ek sath 100 logo ki Mout ho sakti hai ye snake ki bite se dil ka Dora padna Khoon ki ulthi hona aur Naak se khoon jata hai. 

  • Colour Red 
  • Venom Yes
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 1m to 1.5m 
  • Death by Snake 7,000 8,000 people Per Year's
  • Origin inland 
  • Species Reptiles

1 indian Cobra 



Indian Cobra  snake duniya ka sabse Khatarnak snake Hai ye Snake indian me paya jata hai. ye snake me neurotoxic Venom ki bharmar hoti hai. Indian Cobra bahut jyada furtila Hota Hai. Indian Cobra se har saal 1.2 Milion se 1.5 Million Logo ki Death Ho jati hai Indian Cobra ki Height 3m se 4m tak hoti hai ye snake Saapo ki shehli me sabse bade hote. ye Snake ka colour Black Hota hai.

  • Colour Black 
  • Venom Yes
  • Venom Type neurotoxic
  • Height 3m to 3.5m 
  • Death' by Snake 1.2 million to 1.5 Million people Per Year's 
  • Origin india 
  • Species Reptiles 

Consolation 


Dosto is Post ke jariye mene aap logo ko bataya hai 10 duniya ke sabse Khatarnak snake ke baare me. muje ummid hai ki aapko ye post accha laga hoga.

entry.title: India Ka Sabse Bada Gaon Konsa Hai | Ye hai India Ka Sabse Bada Village Janiye humare Post Me
entry.content:
Hello dosto aaj ke post me aap janne wale hai india ka sabse bada Village Ke baare me  India ka sabse bada Village Konsa Hai India ka sabse bada Gaon konsa Hai Aaj ke post me sab kuch janne ko milega aap logo ko. To banye rahe humare Post me.

Photo by :- mensxp.com

Dosto  wese to india Asia hi nahi Duniya ka Sabse bade desho me se ek hai. India ki Total Population Lakbak 1.4 Billion Yani 140 crore se bhi jadah Ho Sakti Ye to 2016 Ki Report ke Hisaab se hai Lekin india ki Population Isse bi jadah ho sakti hai EK Andaze Ke Mutabik 2030 Tak india ki Population Lahkbak 1.5 billion yani 150 crore tak pahunch sakti hai aur india duniya ka sabse jadah Population Wala desh Ban sakta hai. Ab humare main topic par aate hai Ki india ka Sabse bada Village Konsa hai To chaiye jante hai 


India ka Sabse bada Village Konsa hai 


Dosto wese to india me babut se bade bade village hai. Lekin me aapko india ka sabse bada Village ke baare me batane wala Hu 
Dosto india ka Sabse bada Village. Dosto Ghazipur Jile ka Ghamar Gaon ye india ka sabse bada Gaon hai. Ghamar Gaon Utter pradesh ka Ghazipur Jile ka Gaon hai.

 dosto Ghamar village ki Population ki baat kare to Ghamar village 2009 Ke chunao me 25,000 Votes se bi Jahdah Votes aaye the to aap isse andaja laga sakte ki Ghamar village ki Population kitni Hai. Aur Ghamar Village Mughalsarai Railway station se bi Judha Huwa hai. Aur Ghamar Village ko kash kar indian Army ke liye bi Jana jata hai kyu ki Ghamar village me 10,000 se bi Jahdah Army ke jawan Rehte hai. 

Ghamar Village Me Kya kya Shuvidha Hai 

Dosto Ghamar Gaon Me har chiz ki facilities available Hai Yaha pe Hospital, School, College, Aur Babut se Teshil Bi Hai. Yaha pe Jagah jagah Indian Army ke ghar Bane huwe hai. Ab baat karte hai Ghamar Village kaise jaaye. 

Ghamar village Kaise jaaye 


Dosto Ab alag alag wahano se Ghamar Village ja sakte ho Lekin jo main hai woh hai Railway Ke jariye Dosto Ghamar village Mughalsarai Railway se Juda Huaa hai Aap Mughalsarai Railway Station se Aa sakte Ho.

entry.title: Privacy policy
entry.content:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: https://gujaratyojnaa.uk

Comments


Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media


Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies


Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select “Remember Me”, your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites
Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with


Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data


Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data
Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data


Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.
